property.name: text
property.value:
Zigbee Radio Simulation
This is a simple version of the protocol so that the simulation is as fast as possible. The model has the main characteristics of Zigbee, but without separate layers,
This version just implements a very simple Ad-Hoc On-Demand Distance Vector Routing (AODVR), the next step would be to implement the Medium Access based on CSMA-CA for non-Beaconing Networks.

property.name: MsgId
property.value: {Data = {IdReq = 10, Lifetime = 0, NoH = 8, Requester = 12, Responder = 6, SeqN = 1}, Sender = 4, Type = "RREQ"}

property.name: Table
property.value: {{Dest = 0, Next = 0, NoH = 0, SeqN = 0}, {Dest = 12, Next = 1, NoH = 6, SeqN = 1}, {Dest = 1, Next = 1, NoH = 1, SeqN = 1}, {Dest = 27, Next = 27, NoH = 1, SeqN = 1}}

property.name: text
property.value:
Next_State == 1 --> RepetedREQ (Recibe RREQ y SI esta en ActiveREQ) Next_State == 2 --> NewREQ (Recibe RREQ y NO esta en AvtiveREQ) Next_State == 3 --> GoodREP (Recibe RREP y SI esta en ActiveREQ) Next_State == 4 --> No hay cambio de estado (se descarta un RREP no valido)
El resto de valores no son posibles

property.name: MsgId
property.value: {Data = {NoH = 2, SeqN = 2, Responder = 10, Requester = 25, IdReq = 1, Lifetime = 0}, Sender = 27, Type = "RREQ"}

entity.name: IterateOverArray
entity.doc: Iterate a contained actor over input arrays

property.name: text
property.value:
OJO: LEE el valor de MsgId, antes de cada iteracion incluso antes de lanza el evento de la Tabla.!!!
Busco al destinatario (para generar el RREP o reenviar el RREQ) Busco al emisor, si es el 1er mensaje q recibo de un nodo vecino (a 1 salto de distancia) lo aũado a la tabla
Busco al fuente (nodo que quiere una ruta con el nodo destino) si no exite en la Tabla lo aũado. si ya esta (p ej, si me llega el mensaje dsd varios nodos) no vuelvo a aũadirlo
(el objetivo es optimizar la ruta en funcion del SeqN, por el momento me conformo con que se creen bien)

property.name: expression
property.value: {Sender=NodeId, Type="RREP", Data={Responder=NodeId, Requester=mens.Data.Requester, Lifetime=100, IdReq=mens.Data.IdReq, NoH=1, SeqN=SeqN}}
